about.title: About Me
about.content: Write about yourself here - your interests, hobbies, personal journey, or anything you'd like to share about your life outside of work. This is your space to express who you are beyond your professional achievements.

experiences.title: Life Milestone
experiences.description: Describe a significant personal experience or achievement from this year

experiences.title: Another Experience
experiences.description: Share another meaningful moment or journey

projects.name: Personal Project Name
projects.description: Description of what you built or accomplished in your personal time

projects.name: Another Personal Project
projects.description: Another project you worked on for fun or personal growth

philosophy.title: Life Philosophy
philosophy.content: Share your thoughts on life, values, or what drives you personally. What principles guide your decisions and how do you approach challenges?

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.message: Feel free to reach out if you'd like to connect about any of these topics or just have a chat!
